name: Roll20 - Dark Minimal
description: A minimal dark theme for roll20 site, Overhauled most styles on all menus, chat and character sheets. Tested using pathfinder rule system. Scrollbars: - If using firefox simply apply dark theme in customisation options. - If using chrome I advise using the scrollbar customiser to match the colors: Scrollbar Customiser
additional_info:
v0.0.2-
Added base elements to use dark styles

v0.0.3
Updated character sheet base elements to include dark grey styles

v0.1.0
Overhauled Toollbar Menu,
Updated Input boxes and buttons,
Tweaked chat boxes,
Optimied CSS,
Fixed browser compatiblilty issues,

v0.1.1
Fix roll20 portrait position bug on firefox browser,
Fix invivisble scrollbar bug on chrome browser,
